assessment_item.subject: Botany
assessment_item.title: LAAPAR-Q7-தாது உப்புகள் எந்த அமைப்பில் உறிஞ்சப்படுகிறது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

தாது உப்புகள் எந்த அமைப்பில் உறிஞ்சப்படுகிறது?      

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

மூலக்கூறுகள்         

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6379"},{"text":"

அயனிகள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:6380"},{"text":"

கூட்டுப் பொருட்கள்  

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6390"},{"text":"

கலவைகள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6395"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LAAPAR-Q7-தாது உப்புகள் எந்த அமைப்பில் உறிஞ்சப்படுகிறது?","title":"LAAPAR-Q7-தாது உப்புகள் எந்த அமைப்பில் உறிஞ்சப்படுகிறது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"MEDIUM","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
